text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Rajkot | native_name = | settlement_type = City |photo1a = |photo2a = |photo2b = |photo3a = |photo3b = |size = |border = | image_caption = | image_flag = | image_seal = | image_shield = | image_map = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = India#Asia | pushpin_label_position = above | pushpin_mapsize = 300 | pushpin_map_caption = | pushpin_relief = 1 | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Gujarat | subdivision_type2 = Region | subdivision_name2 = Saurashtra | established_title = | established_date = | government_type = Municipality | government_footnotes = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Pradip Dav | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 686 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_metro_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 1791 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1,286,678 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_urban = | population_metro = | population_density_metro_km2 = | population_note = | population_demonym = Rajkoti | timezone = IST | utc_offset = +05:30 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = | area_code = | blank_name = Climate | blank_info = BSk | website = }} Rajkot is a city in Gujarat state of India. It has a population of over a million and the fourth largest city in the state. It used to be the capital of the princely state of Saurashtra. == References == Category:Cities in Gujarat
title: Rajkot
